name: Trapped (itch) (Sabin Poudel)
description:
Submission by Sabin Poudel:

You are inside a trapped maze.  You have to search a key and escape through door.

Controls:

LEFT ARROW KEY: Move left
RIGHT ARROW KEY: Move right
Q or E: Change gravity
F: Switch Color
M: Toggle Sound
R: Restart game

Made with construct 3 for Reilly JAM 6 "Quirky Platformer Mechanics"

With Love From:  Syder Studio

Music: https://freesound.org/people/deleted_user_38815/sounds/86810/
